pullrequest.title: Do not hardcode sdformat include dirs in the installed CMake targets

content.raw: As SDFormat8 export correctly formed cmake targets, there is no need to manually  call `target_include_directories(${sdf} INTERFACE ${SDFormat_INCLUDE_DIRS}` , and this is actually dangerous if the SDF headers are installed in a different directory in the installation enviroment w.r.t. to the compilation enviroment, see  [https://github.com/robotology/gym-ignition/pull/93](https://github.com/robotology/gym-ignition/pull/93) .
